June 7, 1941 D Edinburgh Charities Contest
Edinburgh Charities Contest 0 Other
edinburgh-charities-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Douglas Colliery, 2nd Wellesley Col, 3rd Tullis Russell. Hymn tune contest - 1st Tullis Russell, 2nd tie between Parkhead Forge and Barry Ostlere & Shepherd Best section 2 band - Douglas Colliery. Best section 3 band - Parkhead Forge. Best section 4 band - Prestonlinks Colliery. 8 bands competed
April 27, 2016, 8:42 a.m. Jan. 29, 2019, 4:54 p.m.
1 Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd John Faulds
2 Wellesley Colliery Band William Pegg
3 Tullis Russell Mills John Haldane
4 Douglas Colliery J. Faulds
5 Parkhead Forge (Glasgow) George Hawkins
Unknown Result Bathgate Band Unknown
Unknown Result Dysart Colliery Silver Band John Faulds
